name: test_e2e_with_logs[357_CMD_ENV_003]
description:

| Item | Value |

| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_ENV_003` |
| **Name** | IFS manipulation |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | env_injection |
